name: Clunker
description:
Immerse yourself in your own world, try yourself as a developer, create levels, ask missions, add details, download levels!
With the built-in editor in the game you have a lot of opportunities, you can try all the details, create levels that only you can come up with and share them with your friends.
The game has an amazing physical engine that allows you to watch the aerodynamic processes, the movement of the wheels, the flight of rockets and hoverboards!
The game has the ability to share their own levels with other players, as well as play them.

Thanks to the many levels that are added every day by players, you can spend long hours of unrestrained fun! At each level, you need to perform missions for which you get stars to get all three stars sometimes you need to pass the level several times.

Enjoy the creation of the imagination!
